output.sentences: Bethany was feeling zany hanging with her friends.
Rebecca was very glad to be hanging out with her friends again.
Susan is always having a good time and was also quite happy to see all of them after so long.
After a while, Rebecca gets tired and thinks she might leave soon.
Before they go, they take a group photo to commemorate the moment.
